channel.title: Comments on: Responding to a Mormon on Grace and Works

item.title: By: Keith Walker
item.dc:creator: Keith Walker
item.description: John, Here is my response to Jana Riess. I posted it on her blog as well as emailed it to her. http://blog.evidenceministries.org/mormon-works-vs-evangelical-grace-not-so-fast-a-christian-response-to-jana-riess/
item.content:encoded:
John,
Here is my response to Jana Riess. I posted it on her blog as well as emailed it to her.
http://blog.evidenceministries.org/mormon-works-vs-evangelical-grace-not-so-fast-a-christian-response-to-jana-riess/

item.title: By: Keith Walker
item.dc:creator: Keith Walker
item.description: Great post John. I am in the process of writing a response to Jana Reiss and was planning on writing similar things. THANKS. Now I'll have to be more creative so it doesn't look like I am parroting you. ;-)
item.content:encoded: Great post John. I am in the process of writing a response to Jana Reiss and was planning on writing similar things. THANKS. Now I’ll have to be more creative so it doesn’t look like I am parroting you. ðŸ˜‰
